text: Place is clean. Crusts are thin. Hard to find, though. Pull into the Shell station. It is attached to it.

name: Michael Lockstampfor
text: This is not a full-scale Cici's, it is attached to a gas station. Adjust your expectations accordingly. They kept the pizza fresh despite a very limited menu. Can't beat a $5 pizza buffet even if the atmosphere leaves a bit to be desired.

name: Michael Goodban
text: Smallest Cicis I’ve ever seen but it’s very clean and fresh. The employees are very friendly and keep the buffet line looking tidy. Although missing the salad and pasta like normal locations there is a wide selection of pizza to choose.

text: Hands down the worst looking, least appetizing place I have ever been into. This is NOT anything like a normal Cici's. I went around 6pm on a Friday night and the place was empty, out of the 6 or 7 tables in the place 2 had dirty dishes all …More

text: It's not the best pizza but it's also not the worst. There is plenty to choose from in the buffet and it is constantly being restocked with fresh pizza.

name: Amber Trinkaus
text: Terrible service. They don't have pizza or in time. Very slow was a waist of my time I know they only can prepare so fast by why so slow and why only two pizzas at a time... Options where great. They switch up the flavor now and then....$5 I fired not bad.

text: All the salad and pizza and dessert you can eat for around $8 with beverage.
